
This Repository hold classes and script used for unit and integration tests

There is need to use this repository unless you want to run some or all tests locally

Documentation
-------------
[TestBase documentation](https://spinnakertestbase.readthedocs.io/en/7.4.0)

[Combined python documentation (Excluding TestBase)](http://spinnakermanchester.readthedocs.io/en/7.4.0)
